text:
Metova

Nashville, TN | Little Rock, AR

On site, remote considered for experienced developers.

We are a software development agency specializing in mobile and web development. We are looking for:

- iOS Developers

- Android Developers

- Ruby on Rails Developers or Elixir/Phoenix Developers

- .NET Developers

More information: http://metova.com/jobs/

Some of our benefits:

- Health/Vision/Dental

- 401k with Matching

- Fiber Internet

- Unlimited Flex Days

- No Set Work Hours

- Craft Beer On Tap

You can apply directly to jobs@metova.com
